g.text: Extract contigs without any BLASTN hits
Contigs without a taxonomy label identification
Quantify and extract contigs (and bases) within different categories
Extract assembly statistics for each contig
partial matches to currently known sequences
Compute summary statistics and LCA of all hits
Extract contigs where LCA is a virus
Identify viruses present in the sample
Perform BLASTN (against nt database) on contigs with virus hits
sanity check to ensure true viral hits
Extract reads quantification for human mapped,
de novo assembled and unassembled reads
Extract contigs without any DIAMOND hits
